DataElement.preferredName: Follow-up Report Post Transplantation Timepoint Follow-up Research Activity Report Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the post transplantation time period for the follow up report.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done._A short textual account; having provided a short account._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed.:Report; a short account.

Concepts.definition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.

Property.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after.:The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual.:A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.
A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the identification of patients' medical records and forms.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: .7/18/13 SLS: Updated common EVS definition for Transplantation - no versioning needed.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done._Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered._A short textual account; having provided a short account._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A number with no fractional part.::2: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.: Report; a short account.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.::2: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.: Report; a short account.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.::6: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.: Report; a short account.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.::100: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.: Report; a short account.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.::1: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.: Report; a short account.

A short textual account; having provided a short account.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

DataElement.changeDescription: Added aqt "Visit" SW 4/2/10. 1/4/11mn-added alt name and cs for 2451: key_visit_id. 6/25/12mn-updated after update to VD. added CS for 2046. 7/16/12mn-removed dup 'follow-up'  from long name that was added back after 6/25.. 8/24/12mn-added cs for 2122. 7/18/13 SLS: Updated common EVS definition for Transplantation - no versioning needed. 7/30/13wz: added alt name for 2550r1. 10/8/13wz: added alt name for 2118r3. .1/3/14mn-added Bridg info.  Alt name "LYMpost_key_visit_type" removed due to being used on CDE 4025233. AK 7/8/16 System generated def displayed as alt def. 2021-4-28 ak
